verses.roman:
haridāsa-ṭhākura--mahā-bhāgavata-pradhāna
prati dina laya teṅha tina-lakṣa nāma

synonyms: haridāsa-ṭhākura—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; mahā-bhāgavata-pradhāna—the topmost of all pure devotees; prati dina—every day; laya—chants; teṅha—he; tina-lakṣa nāma—300,000 holy names of the Lord.
translation: "Haridāsa Ṭhākura, the teacher of the holy name, is among the most exalted of all devotees. Every day he chants 300,000 holy names of the Lord.
